description: A fresh punch featuring ginger, guava, lime, raspberries & mint! A quick & simple refresher for family & friends on a hot Summer day!
name: Ginger Guava Punch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pitcher, pour out half of the ginger ale. Add the ice slowly into the pitcher. Pour the remaining ginger ale with the ground ginger.
Add the guava juice to the pitcher. Give the punch a stir with a long spoon. Add the juice of one lime (at this point you could also add small slithers of lime flesh as well if you love lime). Stir.
Add the frozen raspberries & mint leaves. Give the punch one final stir before serving. Enjoy this refreshing drink on a hot Summer day!
